general_info.summary: This document outlines key aspects of a program, including a message from the Dean, faculty information, lab facilities and infrastructure, industry mentors, and training opportunities. Specific training examples include hands-on drone flying and participation in the NASA Space-app Challenge organized by DEECE, GU.
